name: Captain Squeak
description:
Captain Squeaky is in big trouble!
Dr. Trash is stirring up some villainous plans,
he "CONFINED" Captain Squeaky with his Trashbots
that shoots "POLLUTION", polluting the WHOLE WORLD!!!

This Game is submitted for:
ECO JAM - themed "POLLUTION"
BULLET HELL JAM - themed "CONFINED"

HOW TO PLAY?:
Gather the Soap of Justice (Glowing Orb)
Gather 10 of those and shoot Dr. Trash
Getting Hit by the POLLUTION will deduct your Soap Energy Bar
You can Defeat Dr. Trash when the Whole Globe is Cleaned!!!
The Shield Safe Guard Tiles will defend you from incoming Pollutions.

CONTROLS: KEYBOARD or GAMEPAD
( Space or A ) - Attack
( Arrows or Joystick ) - Movement

DEV NOTE:
Gamepad or Controller isn't fix yet 😅
